extendedInfo.description: Trophy checklist for Dead Space 3 on the PS3, to keep track of your progress towards Platinum.There is a comment by a user saying that some of the trophies are missing. All trophies are listed in the following order, Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum, then any DLC Trophies follow. All 59 trophies for Dead Space 3 are listed.. All 59 Trophies included. This includes the Awakened DLC Trophies.. Descriptions for all 59 Trophies. Your trophy progress is automatically saved when a checkbox is pressed.. Your trophy progress is automatically loaded when you relaunch the application. The Trophy description is shown when a row is pressedDisclaimerThis is an unofficial educational guide created by Dev4WebApps. All trademarks and copyrights referenced are the property of their respective owners and are used under the fair use doctrine. Dev4WebApps and this application are in no way affiliated with Electronic Arts or Visceral Games.

reviews.title: Not All Trophies Present
reviews.comment: Says all trophies are present. One of the first trophies you get isn\'t on there which is intestinal fortitude. Won\'t bother to see how many more aren\'t.
reviews.author: Matthew Johnson

reviews.title: Intestinal fortitude
reviews.comment: I just checked the list. That trophy is there under the silvers. If u read the description u would see the way they organized them.
reviews.author: Ellen Spencer
